004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.counter;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.hal.CounterJNI;
008import edu.wpi.first.hal.FRCNetComm.tResourceType;
009import edu.wpi.first.hal.HAL;
010import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.Sendable;
011import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.SendableBuilder;
012import edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.SendableRegistry;
013import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.DigitalSource;
014import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
015import java.nio.ByteOrder;
016
017/** Up Down Counter. */
018public class UpDownCounter implements Sendable, AutoCloseable {
019  private DigitalSource m_upSource;
020  private DigitalSource m_downSource;
021
022  private final int m_handle;
023
024  /**
025   * Constructs a new UpDown Counter.
026   *
027   * @param upSource The up count source (can be null).
028   * @param downSource The down count source (can be null).
029   */
030  public UpDownCounter(DigitalSource upSource, DigitalSource downSource) {
031    ByteBuffer index = ByteBuffer.allocateDirect(4);
032    // set the byte order
033    index.order(ByteOrder.LITTLE_ENDIAN);
034    m_handle = CounterJNI.initializeCounter(CounterJNI.TWO_PULSE, index.asIntBuffer());
035
036    if (upSource != null) {
037      m_upSource = upSource;
038      CounterJNI.setCounterUpSource(
039          m_handle, upSource.getPortHandleForRouting(), upSource.getAnalogTriggerTypeForRouting());
040      CounterJNI.setCounterUpSourceEdge(m_handle, true, false);
041    }
042
043    if (downSource != null) {
044      m_downSource = downSource;
045      CounterJNI.setCounterDownSource(
046          m_handle,
047          downSource.getPortHandleForRouting(),
048          downSource.getAnalogTriggerTypeForRouting());
049      CounterJNI.setCounterDownSourceEdge(m_handle, true, false);
050    }
051
052    reset();
053
054    int intIndex = index.getInt();
055    HAL.report(tResourceType.kResourceType_Counter, intIndex + 1);
056    SendableRegistry.addLW(this, "UpDown Counter", intIndex);
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  public void close() throws Exception {
061    SendableRegistry.remove(this);
062    CounterJNI.freeCounter(m_handle);
063    CounterJNI.suppressUnused(m_upSource);
064    CounterJNI.suppressUnused(m_downSource);
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Sets the configuration for the up source.
069   *
070   * @param configuration The up source configuration.
071   */
072  public void setUpEdgeConfiguration(EdgeConfiguration configuration) {
073    CounterJNI.setCounterUpSourceEdge(m_handle, configuration.rising, configuration.falling);
074  }
075
076  /**
077   * Sets the configuration for the down source.
078   *
079   * @param configuration The down source configuration.
080   */
081  public void setDownEdgeConfiguration(EdgeConfiguration configuration) {
082    CounterJNI.setCounterDownSourceEdge(m_handle, configuration.rising, configuration.falling);
083  }
084
085  /** Resets the current count. */
086  public void reset() {
087    CounterJNI.resetCounter(m_handle);
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Sets to revert the counter direction.
092   *
093   * @param reverseDirection True to reverse counting direction.
094   */
095  public void setReverseDirection(boolean reverseDirection) {
096    CounterJNI.setCounterReverseDirection(m_handle, reverseDirection);
097  }
098
099  /**
100   * Gets the current count.
101   *
102   * @return The current count.
103   */
104  public int getCount() {
105    return CounterJNI.getCounter(m_handle);
106  }
107
108  @Override
109  public void initSendable(SendableBuilder builder) {
110    builder.setSmartDashboardType("UpDown Counter");
111    builder.addDoubleProperty("Count", this::getCount, null);
112  }
113}
